subtitles:
44000 47072 People once believed
that when someone dies...

47160 51278 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

51360 54591 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

54680 59708 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

59800 62712 Then, sometimes...
just sometimes...

62800 67590 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

119960 124272 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

124360 128399 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

131760 135230 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

135320 138232 - All right, guys, let's do it.
- Devil's fuckin' Night.

138320 141517 - What's the count so far?
- 143 fires.

141600 144273 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

144360 149036 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

151880 155077 Yeah, I remember.
But you guys just can't come in here
and take her away like this.

155160 159438 There are procedures to stick by.
You guys should have
cleared this with me first.

159520 161988 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

162080 164833 - We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

164920 167070 I didn't give the order
to move her.

167160 169879 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see why they
took away your gold shield.

169960 173748 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
173840 177389 All right, clear out of here.

177480 179471 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

181360 186480 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

186560 188630 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

188720 191712 Look, I will. You just, uh,
lie back. Come on, come on.

201640 203710 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

203800 207952 Yeah, look. Your sister...
she's gonna be okay.

208040 211953 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.

212040 214713 She's my friend.
Her and Eric.

217680 221593 - You lied to her about Eric.
- Look, I had to.

221680 225036 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.
225120 227031 She's gonna die, isn't she?

235720 241158 Now, come on.
Come on, it's okay.
243200 245191 She's gonna be fine.

262760 266912 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

267000 269468 I used to think
that was true about everything...
269560 273758 families, friends, feelings.

273840 277594 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

277680 281798 two people who are meant to be
together... nothing can keep them apart.

318560 321597 What are you,
like the night watchman?

342080 344196 You know, what
this place needs...
344280 347158 is a good natural catastrophe.

347240 351199 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

351280 354829 Mickey, come on, man. You... You got
to put the mustard underneath first.

354920 357115 Maybe a flood
like in the Bible.
357200 360112 Hey, hey, hey, let me do it.

360200 364079 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

364160 367436 Come on. Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me. Lots of onions.

367520 370751 - All right, here you go.
- Hey, all right.
370840 373354 Now we're talkin'.
373440 377718 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

377800 381475 - How do you steer that thing
on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

381560 384950 See, now, Sarah, she's a genuine
hot dogger. You hungry?

385040 387110 - You buyin'?
- I'm buyin'.

387200 390715 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
390800 393872 They make you fart big time.

399960 402349 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

402440 405159 from all the crap
floating around in it.
406400 409233 I wish I could have seen that.
467680 470797 Fire it up! Yeah!

535320 538551 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-Bird, cop car, cop car.

545880 547996 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

553800 556109 - Damn it!
- Oh, my God!
- What was that?

556200 558111 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
558200 561510 Mickey, call it in for me!

651560 655030 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

655120 658954 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
659040 661110 Place looks fine to me.
661200 663873 Let's redecorate.
667280 669316 "Abashed, the devil stood...
669400 672915 and felt how awful goodness is.

673000 677391 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
690040 692634 No, no, no, no, me first.

738480 741278 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

744520 748752 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

748840 751593 Look at that.
Look at that.

my new favourite holiday.
755920 759230 To Devil's Night.

759320 762596 You just go over there
and tell your pals...
762680 765035 You sick fuck.

your motherfuckin' mind, man?

776680 779911 Pussies drink last, man.

this one isn't?

- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
802840 805513 Fire it up! Fire it up!

870840 873274 - Come here!

908880 912156 Just paint your face

913440 916671 Slipping me away from you
917840 922277 It doesn't matter how you hide

922360 924828 We find you
if we're wanting to

and close your eyes

930880 935396 Sleep a while
You must be tired
935480 937675 But every night I burn
937760 940672 Screaming the animal scream

946800 950793 Dreaming the crow-black dream
955520 959798 Dreaming the crow-black dream

take it or leave it.
991240 994357 Right there for ya.
994440 997273 Decisions, decisions, yes.

1001920 1005037 child molestin',
saprophyte motherfucker.

1053640 1057599 The stretch of true realities
1060600 1064479 They keep calling me
1064560 1068235 They keep calling me
1069360 1072352 Keep on calling me
1073920 1077037 They keep calling me

up for, crackhead, huh?

1174960 1178236 Fuck you, murderer!

1178320 1180880 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1180960 1184873 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?

1184960 1188191 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1188280 1190714 - You're out of your motherfucking mind...

1190800 1195430 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them on Halloween.

1195520 1200230 Yeah, yeah, right, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1200320 1202675 Her name was Shelly.

1202760 1205638 You cut her.
You raped her.

1205720 1211272 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1220160 1224836 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1224920 1229357 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1233760 1236320 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1238000 1239911 We never miss.
1248480 1251119 Try harder. Try again!
1256000 1260596 Victims. Aren't we all?

1271160 1276757 Sometimes it rains
inside my head
1276840 1280276 When the words run dry

1280360 1284273 And the walls are breathing
Hands are...

1284360 1288478 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- Yeah, it's a mess.

1293480 1295471 No, they don't
have to take you

1295560 1298199 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1298280 1302671 No, they don't
have to take you away

1302760 1307197 - Get out of my way, you worms!
- No, they don't have to take you away

1307280 1310955 Give me some of that
over there!

1311040 1314316 Why don't you ladies
come by later? Check me out.

1314400 1319190 Hey, guess what.
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1319280 1323558 - Boom.

1323640 1327553 Gather your soldiers. You're on

1327640 1330996 - Is the man in?

1359280 1361191 You're thinking
about the past.
1365960 1368030 Dad gave me this.
1368120 1372113 Fifth birthday.

the moment you know you're gonna die.
1389480 1392358 Is she asleep?
1398320 1400470 I think we broke her.
1405200 1407270 I love her eyes.

1412920 1418790 No, they don't
have to take you away

1424320 1427232 Hey, kid, get the hell
outta the road!
1433320 1435595 I don't hate them
1435680 1437955 But I know them

1438040 1442750 I don't want them
hangin' 'round

1444880 1447348 Don't fuck with me.
1449080 1451310 I told you to stay out of here.

1455000 1458834 She's busy. Go play with

1458920 1461229 I don't have any dolls.

1463200 1467398 - Get some food, huh?
- Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1472840 1476389 "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."

And 20 from 60...

somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1508760 1511069 Always got to dick off.

1511160 1514948 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1522920 1526469 "Suddenly I heard a tapping,
as if someone...

1526560 1529358 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1532000 1534230 What are you talking about?
1534320 1537073 You heard me rapping, right?

1537160 1541119 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1543440 1546750 - I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.
- Yeah?

1546840 1549991 - Gold.
- You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1559080 1561514 Shit on me.
Shit on me!

1568320 1570470 Mr Gideon.
You're not paying attention.

1578120 1582955 I repeat,
a gold engagement ring, yes?

1583040 1586715 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1590320 1592834 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1597640 1602760 - Who's this sack of shit?
- That's Tin Tin, one of
T-Bird's little helpers.

1602840 1605752 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1605840 1608513 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1608600 1612479 This could be a turf hit, but it
doesn't look like your usual gang crap.

1612560 1617190 Oh, come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1617280 1619555 I'm supposed to thank you
for that, right?

1619640 1622791 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1623960 1626235 What the hell
do you call that?

1628160 1633439 I call it blood, Detective. I suppose

1633520 1636159 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1643760 1646593 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?
- Don't you know this game?

1646680 1650878 What game are you talking about?
Okay, the rings.
I'll tell you about the rings!

1650960 1655511 They're in that-that metal box!

1655600 1660549 Take... Take the fucking rings out! You
can choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1664000 1666468 - Look, it goes up to the attic.

1682640 1686679 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1709600 1712398 - You have one chance to live.

1712480 1716439 - Thank you.

1716520 1720274 Now you're going to tell me

1720360 1722271 The Pit. They all

1722360 1727992 All of T-Birds's little potato-heads

he lives there upstairs, all right?

1728080 1731834 - Funboy.

1731920 1734229 - Shit!

1734320 1736959 - Stop! Stop! Please!

1741760 1744991 Each one of these is a life...

1751560 1753676 I'm not gonna kill you.

1806200 1808350 One root beer.

1903960 1906315 Leave it, leave it! Run!

1931520 1934034 You are very restless.

1937080 1941392 - Be careful of what you ask for.

1955400 1957755 Seeing is believing,

1982320 1984197 I didn't have nothing

2005840 2008149 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2008240 2012916 - Whatever you say, I can do.

2022560 2025632 Call it my need to know.
2056040 2058508 Let go, you creep!

2063480 2066631 You need to slow down,

- He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

- Sometimes.

2081280 2085990 It's more like surfing than skating.

2115480 2119598 Annie, look at that.

2126120 2129032 for a very nice girl who found herself

2196680 2200229 and watch this whole fucking city

- It's a squab.

2237200 2239430 Bird. B-B-Birdie.

2269920 2272639 Don't sweat it.

2296760 2299513 You need professional help.

2302200 2306318 Bingo!

2316040 2320511 - Jesus Christ!

2320600 2325151 Stop me if you heard this one.

2330360 2334035 He hands the innkeeper

2334120 2336475 Don't you ever fuckin' die?

2336560 2338676 "Can you put me up
for the night?"

2351160 2354436 Look what you've done

2377680 2379557 I've got a gun

2382480 2385074 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2402120 2405829 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2417120 2421398 Mother is the name for God

2421480 2426031 Do you understand?

2437000 2440629 Your daughter is out there

2476640 2479234 Fill it up yourself,

2479320 2481914 I really need this.

Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2502600 2505592 Get my friend here

2505680 2509355 - Hey, hey, hon!

2513560 2516597 You stay put right there.
2525640 2527676 Get away, steamhead.

2558440 2562228 Well, as you can see,

2562320 2565596 the site of last year's biggest

2565680 2569036 It was exactly one year ago

across the street from me...
2569120 2571236 was totally demolished by fire.

2597360 2599749 You still have your hat on.
2601960 2604315 I gotta sit down.
2613760 2617878 are you some kind of... of ghost?

2627120 2631477 I don't know what I am. I need you

2633440 2637319 Well, you took a six-story
swan dive out of a window.
2637400 2640358 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2640440 2644831 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2644920 2647195 I mean, come on.

2647280 2651034 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.

2651120 2654635 And her body finally
just gave it up.

2654720 2657996 I saw it, man.
I-I couldn't do jack for her.

2668080 2669911 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2681920 2686948 I saw her through your eyes.

2687040 2692592 Yeah, well, you got
to understand something, all right?

2692680 2696355 I was... I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2696440 2700149 Uh, give me something

2704840 2707229 Why didn't you do
something about it?

who signed the petition...

2710560 2713870 would talk after
what happened to you?
2713960 2717032 I kept asking questions and...

2717120 2719680 finally got busted for sticking my nose
where it wasn't wanted.
2723520 2725397 This your wife?

2725480 2729792 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not any more.
We're getting a divorce.

2734480 2737916 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2738000 2740230 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2740320 2743630 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2753760 2758197 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2763000 2765753 You gonna vanish
into thin air again?

2769440 2771829 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2774680 2780357 Look, man, um, I'm sorry
as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2791840 2794354 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2794440 2796954 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2797040 2800430 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2800520 2803592 - Other than that, my day sucked.
